de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.aggregate

Class MCS06AggregateComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasureBase
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasureBase
        • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lsr.aggregate.MCS06AggregateComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityMeasure, TermSimilarityMeasure, TextSimilarityMeasure

    public class MCS06AggregateComparator
extends TextSimilarityMeasureBase
    Implements the aggregation strategy by Mihalcea et al. (2006).

      • MCS06AggregateComparator

        public MCS06AggregateComparator(TextSimilarityMeasure measure,
                        java.io.File idfValuesFile)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        The constructor ideally should take a _Term_RelatednessMeasure as parameter, not a _Text_RelatednessMeasure. However, as the LSR-based comparators are implemented as the latter, we stick to that here, but use only the word- relatedness function.
        Parameters:
        measure - The word similarity measure to use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
